project.name: jaxws-security
project.description:
Various JAX-WS security practice code. Tested on glassfish-4.0-b89. The following are needed in order for the services to work:
1) Starting code-first, copy the generated WSDL and rename to wsit-<fully-qualified-service-name>.xml. Put it directly under WEB-INF. 2) Change the policy section as needed. In this project, a username/password validator is configured. Note that username/password can be validated by configuring the container realm too. 3) Deploy the service and verify that the policy is included in the generated WSDL.
c.f. http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/views/java/libraryview.jsp?search_by=java+web+services:
